ProductInfo.Features:
Samsung NX300 Mirrorless Digital Camera with 20-50mm F/3.5-5.6 ED II Lens (White)

Full Size Tripod + Monopod + Table Top Tripod + LCD Screen Protectors + Cleaning Kit
